name: Regeta's Outlandish Conadventures demo
description:
This is an ongoing project of Regeta's Outlandish Conadventures.   More information will be coming soon as more is completed

In a world where one can develop a power that turns their cosplay into battle gear which in turn allows the wearer to do superhuman feats, Regeta by chance has gained the ability to produce BST power!  He takes this opportunity to leave his mundane existence behind  to test his new found abilities and travel the Convention Circuit, in hopes of participating in Cosbattling events – something he’s always loved watching from the sidelines. Together with a Dark Elf Treasure Hunter and a high-energy Wolf Beastkin, each whom have their own goals for the Convention Season, Regeta dives into a whole new realm of adventure – one he soon learns is far more complex and dangerous than what it seems.

Amid all the fun-filled skirmishes and random, interesting encounters, Regeta suddenly finds himself caught in the middle of a power struggle between the two most Powerful Cosbattlers ever to have competed in The Circuit. No longer just a spectator, Regeta must quickly adapt to his current reality before his exciting, new beginning turns into his own perilous ending. As the weight of being a Cosbattler and the threat of being a targeted Circuit participant fuse, Regeta must now walk his chosen path before his dreams. Will he overcome or will be crushed by forces beyond him?
